item.title: Need major help plzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @b3nj4m1n_8 b3nj4m1n_8
item.description:
@b3nj4m1n_8 wrote:

open up client.java then type whatever weapon your using then find the emote like this for example

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739 && specialAmount >= 100) {//d axe
startAnimation(2876);
specialDamage = misc.random(80);
specialAmount -= 100;

the emote that the d axe is using is 2867 when your on your server type ::emote then the animation and see if it goes with the weapon your using.

idk if this works for you or if you even understand me but if not pm me and ill keep in touch with you

Read full topic
